bug.author: RaydonLiu
bug.summary: Tensorboard run faile in GPU image
bug.description: when I run an ml-workspace GPU container, jupyter_tensorboard raise error ' Invalid response: 500 Internal Server Error'. And when I run tensorboard on a terminal, it raises error 'ValueError: Duplicate plugins for name projector'. So how can I fix this problem?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/RaydonLiu>@RaydonLiu</denchmark-link> Thanks for reporting this issue. It will be fixed in the upcoming release. You can already try it here: . The new stable version will be released in the next few days.
